reviewerName: Marty Nemko "Host, Work with Marty Nemko--NPR...
reviewtext: I'm in my 24th year as host of a radio show on NPR-San Francisco. These are the headphones I've been using for the past four years: Great sound quality and as important, very light and comfortable on the ear, so I can keep them on for the entire show and never feel at all uncomfortable. If you want to look like a pro, these aren't for you. They look like what a teeny-bopper would wear. But if you want an amazing combination of sound quality, comfort, and low cost, these are great.
summary: Doesn't look professional but sounds it AND is super comfortable
